website_summaries.verdict: Tough corrugated plastic bristles resist mildew and mold, making this scrubber great for outdoor use.
pros: Durable weatherproof hardwood powder coated metal
Composite scraper construction resists moisture and rust
For best results, mount to a sturdy surface
Long plastic bristles resist mold and mildew

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrated within a year
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this product outside off my driveway. I knew it would fade in the weather over time, but it was very disappointing how quickly it disintegrated. In less than a year the wood quite literally disintegrated. Clearly it’s not made of very dense wood, and little or no weatherproofing has been applied to it.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: It functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The brushed arrived in undamaged packaging. But..... there was a screw broken which holds one of the lower brushes. Aside from the broken screw, it works as it should and cleans my wife and mines Muck boots from mud and dried dirt. I was a little sceptical before buying after reading reviews on bristle stiffness. Reviews stated the bristles were weak. After a week the bristles don't seem to be falling out or becoming weak. If this changes I'll update my review. I don't think I'd want them any stiffer than they are now, for fear of the brushes destroying other footwear such as my leather cowboy boots or any shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ileagle

customer_reviews.title: Bristle issue
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately, bristles started coming out. Seemed durable enough but after a couple uses bristles started to fall out during use. UPDATE: The seller sent out a new brush free of charge to replace the defective one. We have had installed for a few weeks and have had no issues. The seller has excellent customer service and very responsive to the customers needs and resolving problems.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Bust that Red Dirt Road off your Boots !
customer_reviews.text: Clean OFF your BOOT's ! this Rhino will only be as Strong as it's weakest mount. Before you even THINK about using the Rhino. Lag into a 2"x12"x 2' redwood or into the Cement ! Now, the Rhino can do the job expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Gets the mud off!!
customer_reviews.text: We live out in the country in TN. Most of the year it is muddy. This product works great! You will need to attach this to a piece of wood for stability. Hardware was included. We used a 2x6 piece of scrap wood. We keep the scrapper right outside the shop door. It really does a great job at getting the mud and muck off the boots. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: FlygirlKS

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised for use outdoors. Very heavy duty ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised for use outdoors. Very heavy duty and well made. Bristles are stiff. AS WE WERE INSTALLING THEM, people were using them! No explanation needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: it was difficult to decide which mounting system was the best. A combo mount that could be used either ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed at our farm/house to scrape off boots as you enter the house. I wish that Rhino would make one that can be mounted EITHER way instead of needing to choose which one to order. Not knowing for sure where we would keep it, it was difficult to decide which mounting system was the best. A combo mount that could be used either way would be ideal. It is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: The Rhino Boot Scraper worked really well to remove sand and dirt from our shoes, but after two days use (2 or 3 times per day) the bristles started coming out in clumps. They were not secured well--the small wire staples or retainers designed to keep the bristles secured in each end pulled out. The company needs to redesign this product. I received a refund the day after I sent the box back, so I'm happy about that. I will research another product, focusing on durability.
customer_reviews.author: w3p..49

customer_reviews.title: Must mount to a surface
customer_reviews.text: This boot scraper removes most of the mud off my work boots. The scraper is sturdy and well made and included all necessary hardware to mount to a wood surface. It will be next to impossible to keep the scraper in place while cleaning your boots/shoes without mounting it to something. But, since the walkway in front of my doorway is concrete, I mounted my scraper to a two foot long board instead which worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Houstonian1

customer_reviews.title: Works now what about long term
customer_reviews.text: There are stronger foot brushes out there. But for a hunting shack this will work. Mounting screws come with it.
customer_reviews.author: shipmag

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that wood was used in the assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for outdoor mounting. Disappointed that wood was used in the assembly. I’ve sprayed it with clear sealer. Hopefully that will extend the life of the wood. Recommend plastic components in future design changes. Also, a full brush on the bottom is better for work boots or golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Need the right tools to mount it into cement or a sturdy object.  Won’t stay in place without.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been able to get this mounted to a cement porch yet. It’s not much use unless it holds into place. But the bristles all around it make it a great boot, or shoe cleaner to get the mud and dry dirt off from outside tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Kare Bear

customer_reviews.title: A must for every barn, house, cabin.
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are nice and firm. The hardware that comes with it to secure it to a surface are totally unusable. Not a huge issue. I recommend using legit hardware bolts, screws, or anchors to secure it to the desired surface.
customer_reviews.author: MorseCode

customer_reviews.title: I was excited about this product after I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product after I used it the first time because it worked so well. After using it a couple of times I noticed some of the bristles were coming off of one side of it. I thought it might only be a few but I notice more and more coming off now. I have to make sure and pick them up because I don't want our dogs swallowing them. I am sure mine just represents the 1% that slip through there quality checks. It's just disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clean your boots and shoes
customer_reviews.text: I put it on our back porch with a boot puller I made. Nice to have item when your boots are muddy. When you get done working brush the mud off your boots and sit them up to dry
customer_reviews.author: TONAN

customer_reviews.title: Works good in short term
customer_reviews.text: This boot scraper worked fine the first years, but the second year the side fell off. I hand this mounted outside in the weather, and perhaps it would have lasted longer in a garage or tool shed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Vasicek

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance
customer_reviews.text: Works but 2nd day a screw broke off one of the sides. Then I looked close and another screw was only half way screwed in so I tried to screw it all the way an broke instead of moving any. It’s ok for the price I guess but probably won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Southern styles

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the mud season were in
customer_reviews.text: It seems a little narrow and tight for a size 12 boot. But I think once I get it fastened down it will be alright, when Idid use it it cleaned my shoes without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lee F.

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this boot scrapper
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought 3 of these boot scrappers. One for our home, one for our shop at work and one for his field truck. Every one of them get used often. Great quality. Shipped very fast. Will definitely buy again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ♛ ʝɛαŋŋιɛ ʝαŋɛ ♛

customer_reviews.title: Made for outdoors - not really.
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is on the concrete step outside before my back door. Now it's almost 2 years later and the wood pieces in the middle have come off with bristles falling out as well. I'm in Florida, not sure how this would hold up where there's lots of snow laying on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Moynihan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for farm life
customer_reviews.text: Super cool but it is a little small.Larger model not available.All my hunters have huge feet big big boots!! So
customer_reviews.author: trish c.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My husband drives a truck which delivers, fertilizer, rock, sand, lime rock etc...I was forever trying to keep my floor clean, now since he uses the Rhino Bilt Boot Scraper, this has cut down his tracking in on my floors by %90 or more. Love this product, you will need to mount it on something my husband used a small piece of plywood. I give this product 5 Gold Stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard boot scraper. works great, very well made, good cost valve ratio and easy install just 4 screws into your desired location and scrub those muddy boots and shoes away.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of them, one had a split in the wood. Manufacturer needs better quality control procedures.
customer_reviews.author: wikiriki

customer_reviews.title: it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: working alright so far. hasnt been test with a lot of mud yet but should be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN STRICKLIN

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for a little heavier duty. Bottom brushes ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a little heavier duty. Bottom brushes are fraying after only a couple months. It is used multiple times a day by 4 people. Cleans sides of boots/shoes well. Bottom of treaded boots do not clean well on the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: A buy worthy of its value
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to install. It is great to use and I am so happy I don't have to hear pounding feet all day from the kids .
customer_reviews.author: John Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality bristles make for a great boot brush
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, quality bristles make for a great boot brush. Needs to be mounted to something. I've mounted mine a piece of wood and an inexpensive rubber boot tray underneath, since the area surrounding our mudroom doors is paved with flagstone. I can simply pick it all up and toss the expended dirt into the garden. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Emmens

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: Great Strong bristles. Screwed right to Deck. My wife is very happy Im tracking in a lot less dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The boot scrapper is well built and easy to mount on a board
customer_reviews.text: The boot scrapper is well built and easy to mount on a board. This is necessary to be able to hold the scrapper while cleaning your shoes or boots. It works well and is easy to clean the dirt, sand etc. from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Drilled this into concrete and have used it at least weekly for 2 months. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews before purchasing and they said to ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing and they said to install it on a board, That worked really well ! The board should be long enough for you to step on on each side side so you don't have to turn around
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small farm and our boot are always dirty and impossible to clean off with a rug. The boot scraper does a great job of taking off most if not all of the mud/dirt. I’m about to buy another one for our front door.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great scraper - like that it fastens to the deck

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product to clean boots and shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Really cleans your boots and is durable. Must have for muddy boots and sandy shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Well made and it works
customer_reviews.text: We have had a couple of different brands over the years and this is the best we have found .

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for those husbands who like to track dirt inside the house!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A Must For Me
customer_reviews.text: With horses, chickens, mud, and general shoe/boot crud around, I can't live without these. I hate tracking excess dirt into the house, so this are at two of my external doors. I got this one as a gift for my daughter, spouse and kids to use - hint, hint!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Rhino Boot Scraper is great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! My husband mounted it by our back door. Now after walks, we’re not tracking debris through our house!

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 days of use good price bad product

customer_reviews.title: Should last a longer.
customer_reviews.text: Work good at first. Bought in July of 2017, but just put into use month and a lot of the bristles have already come out.

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: the item was damaged and had to be returned. it was damaged before it was packaged, very poor quality control

customer_reviews.title: The fine brissels are stiff and durable.
customer_reviews.text: We mounted it to a piece of outdoor plywood so we could step on it to hold it down while wiping each food across it. It works great - should have purchased sooner!

customer_reviews.title: Muddy work boots .
customer_reviews.text: Working for a landscaping company and being the only female in the office this makes life so much less messy .

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for messy boots!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for extremely messy boots. Really cuts down on the mess being tracked in.

customer_reviews.title: No installation hardware
customer_reviews.text: I revived the boot scrapper with a torn box and no installation hardware When I called the 1888 number I was simply told to leave a message. Very disappointed for a first time buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good item. But, have a hose nearby to wash out the caked up mud, after a good rain, if you're in a muddy location. Would be 5 stars, but the anchors for mounting it are worthless. Buy some redheads.
customer_reviews.author: lourdes galligan

customer_reviews.title: Now it works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: The brushes broke off the side after only a couple uses. We ran a bolt all the way through it instead of the small grabber screws that held it before. Now it works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Works well, even for young children.
customer_reviews.text: Put one at each door of my new house, and went from sweeping rocks through the whole house almost hourly to only needing to sweep next to the door every couple of days. Easy enough to use that even my 3 year old scraps his shoes by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Jmchan

customer_reviews.title: This is made from low quality wood. Mine didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: This is made from low quality wood. Mine didnt even last a year. It rotted to pieces and fell apart as i tried scraping my shoes one day.

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time. You need to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. You need to put it on a board so you can stand on the board and hold it steady.

My husband screwed it to a board long enough to hold it down with one foot while he scraped the mud from his boot with the other foot. The bristles are very stiff and do a good job cleaning mud from work boots.

customer_reviews.title: Product came with half the screws missing, loose or ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came with half the screws missing, loose or broken with the screw head gone...very poorly assembled. I used my own wood screws and had to drill new guide holes. As for its intended use , I have not used it yet....More to follow .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a decent price. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy boot cleaner/scraper. I have nothing to compare it to, but I can't imagine another product that could improve on the design or quality of parts. Works great for my garage where I often pick up metal slivers and saw dust. It removes all the debris from my boots and I'm no longer getting barked at by the wife when she steps on a metal sliver.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy

product_meta.title: Rhino Bilt Boot Scraper, The Original Boot Scrapers - Outdoor Boot Brush with Warranty
feature_bullets: MOUNTING REQUIRED. Mounting hardware included. For best results, please mount the Boot Scrubber to a sturdy surface.
Boot Scraper built with heavy gauge metal frame and stiff bristles provide the needed strength to handle the toughest cleaning jobs
Great for boot and shoe use around your home, garage, workshops, office buildings or even farms!
Durable weatherproof hardwood and power coated metal for outdoor or indoor boot scraper use
Composite scraper construction resists moisture and rust for lasting durability mounted outside or inside. Product Dimensions 9 5/8L x 6W x 4 1/2H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars611 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
